mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT t1.PARTNER_ID , t1.STATUS , t1.PARTNER_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_VERSION , t1.DELIVERY_FORM , t1.PUBLIC_YN , t1.DESCRIPTION , t1.COMMENT , t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID , t1.OSS_FILE_ID , t1.REVIEWER , t1.USE_YN , t1.CREATOR , t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.MODIFIER , t1.MODIFIED_DATE , t3.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION , (SELECT A1.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A1 WHERE A1.FILE_SEQ = t1.CONFIRMATION_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME , (SELECT A2.ORIG_NM FROM T2_FILE A2 WHERE A2.FILE_SEQ = t1.OSS_FILE_ID) as FILE_NAME2 FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t2 ON t1.CREATOR = t2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200') t3 ON t2.DIVISION = t3.CD_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN PARTNER_WATCHER t4 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t4.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS t5 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t5.REFERENCE_ID AND t5.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t6 ON t5.COMPONENT_ID = t6.COMPONENT_ID WHERE t1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateFrom},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateTo},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{updateDateFrom},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{updateDateTo},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( t3.CD_DTL_NM = #{division} OR t3.CD_DTL_NO = #{division} )
AND t1.STATUS = #{status}
GROUP BY t1.PARTNER_ID ) RESULT WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( RESULT.CREATOR IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator}, '%')) OR RESULT.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator}, '%') )

SELECT RESULT.PARTNER_ID , RESULT.PARTNER_NAME , RESULT.SOFTWARE_NAME , RESULT.STATUS , DATE_FORMAT(RESULT.MODIFIED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS MODIFIED_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(RESULT.CREATED_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATED_DATE , RESULT.USER_NAME AS CREATOR , RESULT.DIVISION , IFNULL(RESULT.PRJ_ID, '') AS PRJ_ID FROM (SELECT t1.PARTNER_ID , t1.PARTNER_NAME , t1.SOFTWARE_NAME , CASE WHEN t1.STATUS = 'PROG' THEN 'Progress' WHEN t1.STATUS = 'REQ' THEN 'Request' WHEN t1.STATUS = 'REV' THEN 'Review' WHEN t1.STATUS = 'CONF' THEN 'Confirm' END AS STATUS , t1.MODIFIED_DATE , t1.CREATED_DATE , t1.CREATOR , t2.USER_NAME , t3.CD_DTL_NM AS DIVISION , (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT PRJ_ID) FROM PROJECT_PARTNER_MAP WHERE PARTNER_ID = t1.PARTNER_ID) AS PRJ_ID FROM PARTNER_MASTER t1 LEFT JOIN T2_USERS t2 ON t1.CREATOR = t2.USER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM T2_CODE_DTL WHERE CD_NO = '200') t3 ON t2.DIVISION = t3.CD_DTL_NO LEFT JOIN PARTNER_WATCHER t4 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t4.PARTNER_ID LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS t5 ON t1.PARTNER_ID = t5.REFERENCE_ID AND t5.REFERENCE_DIV = '20' LEFT JOIN OSS_COMPONENTS_LICENSE t6 ON t5.COMPONENT_ID = t6.COMPONENT_ID WHERE t1.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateFrom},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.CREATED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{createDateTo},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{updateDateFrom},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t1.MODIFIED_DATE,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{updateDateTo},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( t3.CD_DTL_NM = #{division} OR t3.CD_DTL_NO = #{division} )
AND t1.STATUS = #{status}
GROUP BY t1.PARTNER_ID ) RESULT WHERE 1 = 1
AND ( RESULT.CREATOR IN (SELECT X.USER_ID FROM T2_USERS X WHERE X.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator}, '%')) OR RESULT.CREATOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{creator}, '%') )
RESULT.PARTNER_ID = #{item}
ORDER BY RESULT.PARTNER_ID DESC LIMIT 0, 1000
